p: This assay investigated the effect of C. zeylanicum Blume EO on two stages of biofilm development: during formation and at maturity (48 h). Three types of biofilm were used in these cases: C. albicans ATCC 60193 monospecies, C. tropicalis ATCC 750 monospecies, and C. albicans ATCC 60193 and C. tropicalis ATCC 750 multispecies.
